original_text: Is not destruction to the wicked? and a strange punishment to the workers of iniquity?
korean_text: 불의한 자에게는 환난이 아니겠느냐 행악자에게는 불행이 아니겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Is not destruction to the wicked?
and a strange punishment to the workers of iniquity?
sentences.korean_translation: 불의를 행하는 자에게 이상한 형벌이 임하지 않겠는가?
